account_delete.confirm.description:
■Important Notes (※Please read carefully)
・Game data will be deleted and will no longer be accessible.
・Currently owned paid/free jewels will be lost.
・Game data transfer settings via Bandai Namco ID
　will be disabled.
・Deleted accounts cannot be restored.

Selecting [Confirm] will launch an external browser and redirect you to the support site request page.

data.linkage.first_confirm.description:
By linking game data with your BANDAI NAMCO ID,
you can continue playing the game with the same data on different devices.
Would you like to log in to your BANDAI NAMCO ID and link the data?
data.linkage.first_confirm.title: Data Linkage
data.linkage.first_confirm.warning:
The game data you are currently playing is linked to your BANDAI NAMCO ID.
By logging in to your BANDAI NAMCO ID, you can release the linkage or link it with another BANDAI NAMCO ID.
data.linkage.link.description:
Linkage release has been completed.
Would you like to link the following game data currently being played with your account?
data.linkage.link.title: Data Linkage Confirmation
data.linkage.release_other.description:
The logged-in account is already linked with the following game data.
Would you like to release the linkage and link it with the game data currently being played?
data.linkage.release_other.description2: ※Only one game data can be linked to one account
data.linkage.release_other.warning:
Releasing the linkage may make this game data irretrievable.
If you want to link this game data, please select [Data Linkage] from the title screen.
data.linkage.success.title: Data Linkage Complete
data.linkage.update.description:
The game data currently being played is linked with a different BANDAI NAMCO ID than the one logged in.
Would you like to release the linkage and link it with the game data of the newly logged-in account?
data.linkage.update.title: Update Data Linkage ID
data.migrate.confirm.description:
The following game data is already
linked with the logged-in account.
Would you like to link this game data?
data.migrate.confirm.title: Data Linkage Confirmation
data.migrate.last_confirm.description:
The following data currently being played will be
overwritten and cannot be restored.
Are you sure?
data.migrate.last_confirm.warning:
※Paid jewels cannot be linked to different OS.
  They can only be used on the purchased OS.
※Free jewels can be linked to different OS.
data.migrate.no_link.description:
There is no game data linked with the logged-in account.

Please perform account linkage from the in-game menu [Data Linkage].
data.migrate.no_link.title: No Linked Data
data.migrate.same_user.description: The logged-in account is already linked with the game data currently being played
data.migrate.same_user.title: Data Linkage Completed
data.migrate.start.description: Link with existing Gakuen IDOLM@STER account.
data.migrate.start.title: Data Linkage

data.migrate.success.description:

fangage_sheet.description:
※Checking each item indicates consent,
unchecking indicates withdrawal of consent.
fangage_sheet.summary.text:
We will collect some of your information related to the use of this service.
We ask for your cooperation in consenting to the use of this information for advertising and analysis purposes by Bandai Namco Entertainment Co. Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as BNE) and other third parties.
For details of the recipients and the information to be collected, please refer to the items listed in each tab. If you would like to know more about BNE's privacy policy, please see the <link="https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/privacy/?lang=en"><color="blue"><u>Privacy Policy</u></color></link>.
Please note that this consent is optional, so you can still use this service without agreeing to the above usage. Also, even customers who have agreed once can withdraw their consent at any time from the relevant page of this service.
Clicking the [Agree] button below indicates your consent to the use of your information for the purposes stated above.
fangage_sheet.title: Handling of Customer Information

story_event.bonus.description.character: Producing the target Produce Idol grants an event bonus, increasing the amount of Event Pts gained.
story_event.bonus.description.idol:
Producing the target Produce Idol grants an event bonus, increasing the amount of Event Pts gained.
Additionally, the higher the talent bloom stage, the greater the bonus value.
story_event.bonus.description.support:
Owning the target Support Card grants an event bonus, increasing the amount of Event Coins gained.
Additionally, the higher the unlock stage, the greater the bonus value.
story_event.bonus.description_pt_double: ※The higher bonus effect will be prioritized between the bonus target Idol and Produce Idol.

title.delete_userdata.alert: User data that is not linked cannot be restored
title.delete_userdata.description:
Do you want to delete the user data saved on this device?

■Precautions (Please read carefully)
Deleting user data will allow you to start from scratch.
If you want to restore your game data to continue playing, please link your data before deleting.
